casebody.data:
WILLIAM ROBERT HADLEY v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 46831] [106 C. Cls. 819;

329 U. S. —]

Suit for false imprisonment under the Act of May 24, 1938. Defendant’s demurrer sustained and plaintiff’s petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court February 3, 1947.
